game.name: Frozen Hair Salon
game.description:
Elsa is fond of wearing a new and sexy look. She puts every possible effort to make her look fabulous. Today the princess seeks a new look for her hair. Actually, the extreme cold weather has made her hair a little bit frizzy, so she has come to your salon for hairstyling. You would have to play the role of a hair stylist, make-up artist and fashion designer in Frozen Hair Salon. Playing multiple roles will definitely create more fun possibilities for you. 
Find out the hidden hairstyling tools first in this brand new salon game! Once you are done, get ready to design a beautiful hairstyle for her by following the instructions to wash and dry her hair. You would not have time to rest as you also have to provide her with the complete makeover and dress her up. Use your salon and fashion designer abilities to make her look amazing in this one of the best girls games! Your favorite frozen queen is waiting to get a masterpiece of hairstyle. 
Cut her hair with the help of razor, a pair of scissors, as well as position it using a brush and blow dryer! Do not forget to apply the magical lotion to give her hair an expected growth. Use a straightening one or curling iron to change the texture her hair! Give her some highlights using the color dye to change her hair color completely in this princess dress up game! Spray some glitter and use some fun accessories to complete her hairstyle! Enjoy the best of your time online, no download required!
game.metaTitle: Frozen Hair Salon, Dressing Games - Play Online Free : Atmegame.com
game.metaDesc: Play the online free game Frozen Hair Salon at atmegame.com ! We have selected this Dressing games for best excitement and thrill in you!
